name: soundcloud_scrape_trending
description: Scrape trending/popular tracks from SoundCloud. Returns the current top and trending tracks with title, artist, play count, and genre.

steps.code: const tracks = []; const trackEls = document.querySelectorAll('.chartTrack, [class*="chartTrack"], .soundList__item, [class*="soundList__item"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(trackEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = trackEls[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('.soundTitle__title span, a[class*="soundTitle"] span, [class*="chartTrack__title"]'); const artistEl = el.querySelector('.soundTitle__username, a[class*="soundTitle__username"], [class*="chartTrack__username"]'); const playsEl = el.querySelector('[class*="playbackCount"], [title*="plays"]'); const likesEl = el.querySelector('[class*="likeCount"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[class*="soundTitle__title"], a.soundTitle__title'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('.image__full, .sc-artwork img, img'); tracks.push({ rank: i + 1, title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', artist: artistEl ? artistEl.textContent.trim() : '', plays: playsEl ? playsEl.textContent.trim() : '', likes: likesEl ? likesEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } return { genre: `{{genre}}` || 'all-music', trending_count: tracks.length, tracks: tracks, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: trending_data
steps.label: Extract trending tracks
